channel.description: Recent content in resume on TChilderhose

item.title: Resume Revamp
item.description: We’ve currently been hiring at my work and I’ve seen about 200+ resumes in a short amount of time. I made the realization that the visuals of resume effected me more than I thought it should. It made me realize it might be time update and upgrade my resume.
